description:
Aaron Frisch had served as an editor at the Creative Company's Mankato headquarters. Frisch chiefly wrote nonfiction picture books about various U.S. professional sports teams. His writings included the natural world and the lives of notable Americans.

A Night on the Range bagged the Spur Award for Best Western Storyteller from the Western Writers of America in 2011. It also reached the finals that year for a Minnesota Book Award in children's literature. Frisch passed away unexpectedly on January 7, 2013.
name: Aaron Frisch
